name: Mystique
text: True Form — Response: After you flip a shapeshift form upgrade, if all shapeshift form upgrades are facedown, ready your identity. “yes, That’s me!” - Raven

name: Raven Darkhölme
text: Setup: Put the Shapeshifter upgrade into play. Put all 3 shapeshift form upgrades into play, facedown. Fast Heal — Action: Heal 1 damage or remove a status card from Raven Darkhölme. (Limit once per round.)

name: Shapeshifter
text: Permanent. Action: Exhaust Shapeshifter → choose a shapeshift form upgrade and flip that card.

name: Civilian
text: Shapeshift Form. Permanent. Action: Exhaust Civilian → remove 1 threat from a scheme. Forced Response: When this card is turned faceup, flip each other shapeshift form upgrades facedown.

name: Civilian
text: Shapeshift Form. Permanent. Action: Exhaust Civilian → remove 1 threat from a scheme. Forced Response: When this card is turned faceup, flip each other shapeshift form upgrades facedown.

name: Enemy
text: Shapeshift Form. Permanent. Action: Exhaust Enemy → deal 1 damage to an enemy. Forced Response: When this card is turned faceup, flip each other shapeshift form upgrades facedown.

name: Enemy
text: Shapeshift Form. Permanent. Action: Exhaust Enemy → deal 1 damage to an enemy. Forced Response: When this card is turned faceup, flip each other shapeshift form upgrades facedown.

name: Friend
text: Shapeshift Form. Permanent. Action: Exhaust Friend → ready a character other than Mystique. Forced Response: When this card is turned faceup, flip each other shapeshift form upgrades facedown.

name: Friend
text: Shapeshift Form. Permanent. Action: Exhaust Friend → ready a character other than Mystique. Forced Response: When this card is turned faceup, flip each other shapeshift form upgrades facedown.

name: Destiny
text: Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup during a scheme activation, discard the top card of the encounter deck. You may count the number of boost icons on that card instead (limit once per phase). “The near future slips away and my mind rushes..."

name: Infiltration
text: Victory 0. Characters other than Mystique cannot remove threat from Infiltration. When Defeated: Choose to deal 5 damage to an enemy or remove 3 threat from a scheme. While Infiltration is in the victory display, Mystique ignores the guard and patrol keywords, and any crisis icon ([crisis]) in play.

name: Shapeshifter Focus
text: Hero resource: Exhaust Shapeshifter Focus → generate a [wild] resource for a [[shapeshifter]] card. "Maybe you should worry about just being happy with what you have.”

name: Deception
text: Max 1 per round. Action: Flip all shapeshift form upgrades facedown and ready them. Draw 1 card. Choose a shapeshift form upgrade and flip that card faceup.

name: Quick and Dirty
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If the Enemy shapeshift form upgrade is faceup, this attack deals 2 additional damage and gains overkill. "I will get it.”

name: Unconditional Love
text: Action: If Destiny/Irene Adler is in play, ready Destiny/Irene Adler and Mystique/Raven Darkhölme. Otherwise search your deck and discard pile for Destiny and add her to your hand. (Shuffle your deck.) “A rope through Time.”

name: Really ?
text: Hero interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. If the Friend shapeshift form upgrade is faceup, draw 1 card. “Surprise!”

name: Unnoticed
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme ignoring the crisis ([crisis] ) icon. If the Civilian shapeshift form upgrade is faceup, remove 1 threat from each scheme. “Hello Raven, please tell me you didn't kill the poor soldier.” — Destiny

name: Happy Family
text: Action: If you are in hero form, flip to alter-ego form. Heal 4 damage among Raven Darkhölme, Destiny/Irene Adler, Rogue/Anna Marie. “No small thing, letting me in on the secret.”
